example.eg: The sign said to stop.
example.egtrans: 路牌上指示说停车。

example.eg: The shopkeeper put a sign up saying he'd be back in thirty minutes.
example.egtrans: 店主立了个告示，说他会在三十分钟后回来。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 牌子, 告示牌, 公告牌

example.eg: There are signs that it will storm tomorrow.
example.egtrans: 有迹象表明明天有暴雨。

example.eg: Some people say that when cows lie down, it is a sign of rain.
example.egtrans: 有的人说，如果牛躺下，就是要下雨的征兆。

example.eg: What does the pound sign look like?
example.egtrans: 英磅符号是什么样子的？

example.eg: What is your sign?  I'm a Leo.
example.egtrans: 你是哪个座的？我是狮子座。

example.eg: All the shops had small painted signs out front.
example.egtrans: 所有商店的外面都有小小的漆好的招牌。

example.eg: He signed the form at the bottom.
example.egtrans: 他在表格下方签了名。

example.eg: Veronica's hearing-impaired friend signed that he would prefer to meet at seven o'clock that evening.
example.egtrans: 维罗妮卡的朋友有听力障碍，他打手势说，自己希望能晚上七点钟见面。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 以手势示意说, 打手势说

example.eg: The scroll was covered in signs that they could not understand.
example.egtrans: 这卷轴是用符号书写的，这样他们就没有办法读懂了。

example.eg: Ken's sign told us that he was all right.
example.egtrans: 肯的手势告诉我们，他一切都好。

example.eg: The deaf woman's sign indicated that she would drive.
example.egtrans: 那位失聪女子的手势表明自己能够驾驶。

example.eg: Do you know the sign for "cat" in American Sign Language?
He is showing signs of diabetes.
example.egtrans: 他正在显现出糖尿病的症状。

example.eg: Yes, three hundred, but what is the sign?  Positive or negative?
example.egtrans: 没错，是300，不过符号什么？正的还是负的？

example.eg: The rancher inspected the area for coyote signs.
He signed, once he had found the right place.
example.egtrans: 他找到合适签名的位置就立刻签了名。

example.eg: Trying not to make noise, he signed for her to come towards him.
example.egtrans: 试图避免发出噪音，他朝她打手势，让她到自己这边来。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 打手势, 作手势, 比划

example.eg: She has a sister who is deaf, so she knows how to sign.
example.egtrans: 她有个失聪的妹妹，所以她知道如何使用手语。

example.eg: He finally signed after deliberating for a few weeks.
example.egtrans: 在深思熟虑好几周之后，他终于签约了。

example.eg: The movie star signed many autographs that day.
Since the boss had laryngitis, he had to sign his approval of our idea with his head.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 打手势交流, 打手势来表达

example.eg: They signed the basketball star to a new contract.
example.egtrans: 他们和这位篮球明星新签了一份合约。

example.eg: The two signed their conversation so they wouldn't make noise.
example.egtrans: 那两人打手语进行交流，这样一来他们就不会发出声响了。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 打手语说, 打手语示意

example.eg: Leyla signed away all rights to her father's estate.
Johnson signed away his chances in the next election when he approved such an unpopular law.
Please sign in when you arrive.
You can change your password after you've signed in.
My home page looked unfamiliar; then I realised I had signed in to the wrong account.
Debbie signed off by telling Ian how much she missed him.
My father always signed off with "love and kisses, Dad".
This is WKRP in Cincinnati, signing off at midnight.
Ed Murrow always signed off with the words: "Good night, and good luck".
The director must sign off on the project before work can begin.
The doctor signed Greg off for two weeks after his surgery.
Please sign out in Reception before you leave the building.
Don't forget to sign out when you've finished using the computer.
Have you signed that piece of apparatus out?
It's time to sign up for the volleyball team. Practice starts next week.
example.egtrans: 是报名参加排球队的时候了。训练从下周就开始了。

example.eg: Have you signed up for the French translation course next spring?
example.egtrans: 你注册了明年春季的法语翻译课程么？

example.eg: More than 120 patients signed up for the clinical trial.
example.egtrans: 超过120名病人签字同意参与临床实验。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 签字同意, 签名同意
悬挂于门上的标识牌, 门标, 呼号
（电台、电视台的）呼号, 无线电传呼信号
共同署名, 联合签署

example.eg: The priest noticed Mark's hastily made cross as he entered the church.
example.egtrans: 牧师注意到，马克进教堂的时候，快速在胸前划了个十字。

example.eg: The swimmers ignored the clearly-posted danger signs.
example.egtrans: 游泳者们无视醒目的危险标志。

example.eg: The current crisis was caused by the banks' refusing to heed the danger signs.
example.egtrans: 现在的危机之所以会发生，是因为各个银行拒绝对危险信号作出反应。

example.eg: The math teacher told her students to write the answers after the equals signs.
Ben made a fig at Stan.
example.egtrans: 本朝斯坦做出一个表示轻蔑的手势。

dsense.name: hash mark, hash symbol, hash sign

example.eg: To abbreviate the word "number" in English, just use the hash mark.
On a keyboard the minus sign and the hyphen are interchangeable.
He was hopeful that they could still have a picnic, but the clouds forming overhead were a negative sign.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 不好的前兆, 负面征兆
和平的象征, 和平的标志

example.eg: Use a plus sign between the numbers you are adding.
Didn't you see the road sign? - it said 'Cattle Crossing Ahead'.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 交通标志, 道路标识

dsense.name: sign a petition
dsense.guideword: (add one's name to support a campaign)

example.eg: They asked me to sign a petition against it, but I refused.
I will sign for this so you have a record of delivery.
Pass me the letter and I'll sign for him as he's not available just now.
He can communicate perfectly by using sign language.
example.egtrans: 他能用手语进行无障碍沟通。

example.eg: Kyle was doing sign language across the room to ask me if I wanted a drink.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 十字手势, 十字架手势

example.eg: When you've finished shopping, you should sign out of the site.
It won't be his property until you have legally signed it over.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 签字转让, 签字放弃

example.eg: He signed over the house to his ex-wife and their children.
They signed their children up at the local swimming pool.
example.egtrans: 他们给孩子们注册了当地的游泳池。

example.eg: The mother signed her kids up for summer camp.
example.egtrans: 母亲为孩子们报名参加夏令营。

example.eg: Amanda signed her mother up to do a six-week computer course for beginners.
example.egtrans: 阿曼达为母亲报名参加一个为期六个月的电脑初学者课程。

example.eg: Brian signed up to take part in a sponsored bike ride for charity.
example.egtrans: 布莱恩同意参加为慈善机构赞助的自行车骑行。

example.eg: It's very simple: if there's a stop sign, stop.
When she starts tapping her foot it's a sure sign she's angry.
Spots of blood were a telltale sign that a violent crime had been committed.
Some drivers seem incapable of even seeing traffic signs.

trans_examp.trans_cn: V字形手势，V字手势，胜利手势
V字形手势，V字手势，粗鲁的手势

example.eg: Pains in the chest are a warning sign of heart attacks.
